text: Udo Kier (born Udo Kierspe; 14 October 1944) is a German actor and voice actor. He has appeared in over 200 movies. He was born in Cologne, Germany. Kier is known for his roles in Ron Camp in Ace Ventura: Pet Detective (1994), Curly in Barb Wire, as a NASA flight psychologist in Armageddon, and as Ralfi in the movie Johnny Mnemonic. Kier moved to Palm Springs, California in 1991. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:German movie actors Category:German television actors Category:German stage actors Category:German voice actors Category:Actors from Cologne
title: Udo Kier
